verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday night] [V: issued] [ARG1: a stern warning] [ARG2: to Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] , [ARGM-ADV: threatening to withdraw from NAFTA unless it is renegotiated to fix what he has described as unfair terms for the U.S.]
